attributes.action: install Mark E smith as Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this period of scandal within the Palace of Westminster what is required is for an upstanding, no nonsense citizen to be installed as Speaker of the House of Commons. 

I therefore petition that Gordon Brown thinks outside the box and breaks with convention by installing Mark E Smith, lead singer of the 'Fall', as speaker of the House of Commons. This working class hero, whose family fought at Rorkes Drift, will bring dignity back to politics and make the people of Britain proud of their parliament.

rejection.details: Members of Parliament vote to decide who is the Speaker. He/she is not appointed by Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
